pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Napalm targets a single tile and deals 1 damage to it. If there is a ship on that tile, it will be set on fire. The ship will then take 1 damage each round at the start of your turn until destroyed. The fire damage does not trigger passive abilities.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Napalm can be used to get around nasty passive abilities, as it will only trigger them once.$(li)When napalm hits an $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shield/$, it will only deal one damage to the shield. It will not be set on fire.$(li)Try to avoid wasting napalm on low health ships if you can.
